column4: Hey guys know any way to make a key for example access a file eg "/usr/bin/3ddesk" As im using Fluxbox for my window manager so through console would be great if anyone knows the command
why not put 3ddesk in your startfile?
Yea i'd like F2 to run /usr/bin/3desk and ardchoille Its because you need to run it to bring the desktops back up so like press F2 and it brings it up in 3d
what I was saying is you can put 3ddesk in your startfile so it runs when fluxbox starts
